text: The Crying Child is an American television horror movie. It was directed by Robert Michael Lewis. It is based on a Barbara Mertz novel. The movie stars Mariel Hemingway and George DelHoyo. == Plot == After their son dies, a couple moves to a new house in order to forget. Suddenly, the woman starts to hear baby cries all over her home. She is the only one who can hear them. == Cast == * Mariel Hemingway as Madeline Jeffreys * George DelHoyo as Ran Jeffreys * Finola Hughes as Jo Parker == Other websites== * Category:Television movies Category:American horror movies
title: The Crying Child
